title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 09 November 2011 - XWiki
content:

10:41 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* r8d63aae / xwiki-rendering-transformations/xwiki-rendering-transformation-icon/src/main/java/org/xwiki/rendering/transformation/icon/IconTransformationConfiguration.java : Fix javadoc in wrong location - http://git.io/Hs6fqQ  
10:43 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* r638fab7 / xwiki-platform-tools/xwiki-platform-tool-configuration-resources/src/main/resources/xwiki.properties.vm : XWIKI-7116: Add ability to check statuses of External Links ...  
10:43 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* rf538d80 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-rendering/xwiki-platform-rendering-xwiki/src/main/java/org/xwiki/rendering/internal/transformation/icon/XWikiIconTransformationConfiguration.java : Fix javadoc in wrong location - http://git.io/cqhe9A  
10:49 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
11:08 <tmortagne> has quit  
11:10 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
11:15 <lucaa> has quit  
11:38 <evalica> has quit  
11:59 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* r9e8b6bc / (2 files in 2 dirs): XRENDERING-154: Create a Transformation to check broken external links ...  
12:03 <@cjdelisle> XRENDERING-154  
12:05 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* rbb6c541 / xwiki-rendering-transformations/xwiki-rendering-transformation-linkchecker/src/main/java/org/xwiki/rendering/transformation/linkchecker/LinkCheckerTransformationConfiguration.java : XRENDERING-154: Create a Transformation to check broken external links ...  
12:05 <@cjdelisle> that must run pretty slow since java doesn't support the notion of asynchronous calls  
12:05 <vmassol> cjdelisle: seems to be working ;)  
12:06 <vmassol> wdym?  
12:06 <vmassol> (what is "that" ?)  
12:06 <@cjdelisle> oh the checking external links.  
12:06 <vmassol> that's async  
12:06 <vmassol> :)  
12:07 <@cjdelisle> ahh neat, I'll have to look at it  
12:07 <vmassol> and yes java supports async with threads ;)  
12:07 <@cjdelisle> yea  
12:07 <vmassol> it's coded to be perfomant  
12:07 <vmassol> \*performant  
12:07 <@cjdelisle> when you spawn a thread for each job, you run out of memory pretty quickly.  
12:07 <vmassol> it's only one thread in total  
12:08 <@cjdelisle> I was trying to figure out how to do database stuff with callbacks, apparently the jdbc people didn't think it was important to be fast  
12:08 <vmassol> cjdelisle: did you see this: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Admin/ExternalLinkStatus ?  
12:09 <vmassol> (I improved it locally but not deployed to xwiki.org)  
12:09 <@cjdelisle> I have a 200 line piece of node.js which runs about 150 async http requests in 1 thread  
12:10 <@cjdelisle> it was for a site that only let you load things that way, I never really used it because it would make their apache server lag so badly  
12:27 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
13:08 <Ruudjah2> has joined #xwiki

13:58 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
14:01 <Ruudjah2> has quit  
15:10 <+tmortagne> ok just cleaned all stats tables, retrying upgrade of xwiki.org  
15:53 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
15:53 <vmassol> depends what you want to do  
15:53 <vmassol> you can all sort of stuff  
15:53 <vmassol> like if you have wiki syntax in your text content  
15:53 <+sburjan> yepp :) I needed syntax highlight for some bash scripts, so I used code macro with language param  
15:53 <vmassol> if you don't want to evaluate it you'll need to {{{ … }}}  
15:53 <+sburjan> yepp  
15:54 <vmassol> (or use the code macro indeed)  
15:55 <+tmortagne> hmm I get com.xpn.xwiki.XWikiException: Error number 9001 in 9: Access to this document is denied: XWikiOrgCode.MenuMacro  
15:55 <+tmortagne> in the log  
15:55 <+tmortagne> when viewing http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Groovy+Macro it seems  
15:57 <vmassol> sburjan: updated  
15:58 <vmassol> hehe :)  
15:58 <vmassol> so you configured it, cool ;)  
15:58 <vmassol> now we'll need to fix the links !!!  
16:03 <vmassol> btw for each broken link, it'll only be redisplayed every 1 hour only  
16:04 <+sburjan> cool feature vmassol . Keep well shaped large wikis ;)  
16:04 <vmassol> nice spam feature :)  
16:09 <+tmortagne> vmassol: you were right, we really need to fix broken links now :D  
16:30 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
16:30 <vmassol> ahyou did it  
16:34 <+sburjan> we should think of a standard to show example URL's in the documentation, to make it consistent

17:42 <vmassol> I only put the sending of link events in 3.3....  
17:43 <vmassol> ah we're still on 3.3
